title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to create Catastrophe Savings Accounts.
content: Catastrophe Savings Accounts Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to create tax-exempt catastrophe savings accounts (CSAs). Allows tax-free distributions from CSAs to pay expenses resulting from a presidentially declared major disaster. Limits CSA balances to: (1) $2,000. And (2) the lesser of $15,000 or twice a homeowner's insurance deductible .
